title: Downsload speed
body: For some reason I am getting about 250kbps for a 1.5gb update and it's really making me sad. When I take the new nifty test I score a 93 and am told to game on. That's all I want to do :C

replies.body: You might be getting a really good signal with the game servers but those patching servers just aren't getting through very smoothly. Let's try adjusting your port forwarding and flush your DNS as they seem to have a lot of success usually. Follow our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for these steps, and let me know if that's able to help or not.
